original: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saññojana sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saññojana sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto
analyzed: na saññojana sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ ca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ

original: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saññojana vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saññojana vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto
analyzed: na saññojana vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ ca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ
na saññojana sampayuttañca na saññojana vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanasampayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na saññojana sampayuttañca na saññojana vippayuttañca dhamma

original: paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanasampayuttañca
analyzed: paṭicca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na saññojana sampayuttam ca

original: nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto
analyzed: na saññojana vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ ca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha pe adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
